## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G30350](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G30350)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>GLV3, RGF4</u>
- **Gene Name:** GOLVEN 3, root meristem growth factor 4
- **Description:**   root meristem growth factor-like protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2102891
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
